original: Eklund, Frans Leonard, författare, fabrikör, Visby, f. 24/8/77 i Söderhamn av fabr. Gustaf Alfred E. o. Ingeborg Persdotter. G. 98 m. Kerstin Andersdotter, d. 44. Barn: Anna Therese, John Alfred, fabr., Visby, Kairl Göisifa, fabr., Viisiby, Voilio, deiliäg. i Bröd. EMiunds Plåtslageri, Visby, Gurli, g., Ingrid, g. — Genomg. Gävleb. 1. folkhögsk. Egen fabr:rör. i Visby sed. 07. Bild. Bollnäs IF 9i7, num. hed :led. där. Skr.: Skatten i Visby ringmur. Hist. skildr. fr. 1360-1850 (38). Hobbies: skriftställeri, fiske, sport. Erh. ett flert. priser i skidåkn. o. allm. idr.
translated: Eklund, Frans Leonard, author, industrialist, Visby, born 24/8/77 in Söderhamn to Gustaf Alfred E., a manufacturer, and Ingeborg Persdotter. Married in 1898 to Kerstin Andersdotter, who died in 1944. Children: Anna Therese, John Alfred, industrialist in Visby, Kairl Göisifa, industrialist in Visby, Voilio, co-owner of Bröd. EMiunds Plåtslageri in Visby, Gurli, and Ingrid. Attended Gävleb. 1st folk high school. Owns an independent factory in Visby since 1907. Member of Bollnäs IF since 1917, honorary member there. Author of "Skatten i Visby ringmur. Hist. skilr. fr. 1360-1850" (38), a historical depiction. Hobbies: writing, fishing, sports. Has received several awards in skiing and general sports.

mainEntityOfPage.name: Skatten i Visby ringmur. Hist. skilr. fr. 1360-1850
